-e ---

𓌫 CNT>CUT ⇔ Schmied
𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 schnitt ⇔ schnur 𓍿𓈖𓏌𓅱𓏛𓏥
𓍲 𓈖 𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓋳 kilt, apron | schnitt
𓍲 𓏌 𓏏 𓊘 granary < schnitt = hay!

𓂧 𓈖 𓌪 | cut off (heads), kill (someone) | Schnitt שְׁחִיטָה shḥitá ++
𓂧 𓈖 𓂧 𓌪 | slaughter (animals) | 𐌳𐌰𐌿𐌸𐌿 > taunten > töten +++ 𐌿
𓂧 𓈖 𓂧 𓌪 | slaughter (animals) | ⇔ սպանդ spand σφαγή

𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓐬 𓏛 𓏥 | ornaments | uscar @ Irish +++
𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓐬 𓏛 𓏥 | ornaments | •scart (ver)ziert զարդ zard > art
𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓐬 𓏛 𓏥 | ornaments | •scart ⇔ koriste, у́крас úkras ⇔ uscar
𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓐬 𓏛 𓏥 | ornaments | διακόσμηση ⇔ dia-cosmetic

𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓆭 𓀀 | coiffeur |
𓈙 𓎡 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓐬 𓀀 | coiffeur |

𓆭 ⋍ 𓐬 script ⇔ (s)kreybʰ *(s)ker “to cut” scratch ⇔ Schere ⇔ Schnitt

SICKLE 𓌛 𓌜
𓄿 𓋴 𓐍 𓌴 | sickle | a'Sichel
𓄿 𓋴 𓐍 𓌳 | reap | a'secāre

𓆄 𓏲 𓏏 𓅪 | emptiness | სიცარიელე sic'arielee ⇔ sect ⇔ 𓆑 𓎡 𓁸 𓅪
